QuestData.Title: Into the Brewery
QuestData.Description: We need to find out what's going on inside that brewery, $n!$b$bWe may have cleared out some of the bigger pests, but I'm certain there's plenty more where they came from. Gather up a few of your friends, and meet me inside!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Chen Stormstout inside the Stormstout Brewery.
